name: prysm-sepolia.dnp.dappnode.eth
description: Sepolia is an Ethereum testnet which has a closed set of validators, this package lets the user run a beacon-chain node by using the Prysm client. Sepolia network is recommended to test node configuration and node interaction.
author: DAppNode Association <admin@dappnode.io> (https://github.com/dappnode)
